name: Mirror Mirror (Movsac)
description:
Welcome to Mirror Mirror!

Premise:

You play as the network of glowing sentry cubes (two cubes) who shoot down the evil magic bats. Their guns can only shoot when there is an enemy ahead in the aim line of sight.

Those bats cannot be seen with the naked eye,  you must rely on the ceiling mirror to tell their location.

Gameplay:

If you fail to kill a bat before it passes through, you take damage. You can sustain 5 hits.

The cubes are located at the start of the corridor and at the left side wall (green neon cube).

If you shoot a bat, your score increases and the game gets harder gradually.

This is an infinite shooter with no end. It is expected to reach the peak difficulty after 30 bats.

Controls:

  • Mouse movement => Aim
  • Left Mouse Button => Shoot
  • E => Switch between the cubes
  • R => Restart when the game is over
  • Alt+F4 => Exit

Have fun!
